mapper.select: select datetime,amp from Smart_plug where id=#{id} and store_id=#{store_id} and datetime>=#{date} and datetime<(date(#{date})+interval 1 day)
select datetime, sum(amp) as amp from Smart_plug where store_id=#{store_id} and datetime>=#{date} and datetime<(date(#{date})+interval 1 day) group by datetime

select s.datetime, sum( case when e.people = 0 and s.id = 3 then 40/220 when e.people = 0 and s.id = 4 then 20/220 when e.people = 0 and s.id = 5 then 25/220 when e.people = 0 and s.id = 6 then 50/220 when s.id = 111 then 0 else s.amp end ) as amp from Smart_plug s left join Env e on s.datetime=e.datetime where s.store_id = #{store_id} and s.datetime>=#{date} and s.datetime<(date(#{date})+interval 1 day) group by s.datetime

select date_format(datetime,"%Y-%m-%d") as datetime, sum(amp) as amp from Smart_plug where id=#{id} and store_id=#{store_id} and datetime >= (last_day(#{date})-interval 1 month + interval 1 day) and datetime < (last_day(#{date})+interval 1 day) group by date_format(datetime,"%Y-%m-%d")
